=== Ubuntu Hour 2011-06-09 ===

The topics for the meeting where:

* Introduction of the ubunteros.ch platform.
* Coordination between ubunteros.ch and !LoCo activities
* Ubuntu marketing in Switzerland
* Experiences with Natty and Unity
* Presentation about cubee http://ubuntublog.ch/?s=cubee
* GNOME3 introduction
* h-node.com, the free hardware database of the FSF 

The meeting was quite vital and a lot of good ideas came up for future activites. Coordination will happen on the mailinglist.
